SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.serializable

Class GameViewMsg

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.network.serializable.GameViewMsg
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class GameViewMsg extends Object implements Serializable
A class that represents an unmodifiable Game View. This class is a representation of the game state.
See Also:
